attributes.action: Make Marijuana available for production, prescription and recreational use.
attributes.additional_details: It can be used to treat depression, arthritis, cancer, parkinson's disease, epilepsy and more. As a recreational drug, it is next to harmless, it has a calming feel and no side effects. worst case scenario, your fridge will be lacking a few snacks after smoking. People can now use vaporizers, which are a lot healthier than smoking. Cannabis infused snacks could be available for under aged patients, people with lung problems or by personal choice. Follow the path of USA, legalise for the best.
attributes.background: Marijuana has an unbelievable amount of uses which can benefit the public and the economy in many ways. It is proven to be much safer than alcohol, it is an anti-depressant, it will gather millions in tax and could save a lot of time for law enforcement. let people know cannabis and it's benefits.
